Dialogue.NPCText: So you're the shape eveyshape's been talking about. A circle, right?
sorry, you're the first circle I've seen, don't want the other shapes to think I'm like you

Responses.Text: I don't think I want to talk to you

Dialogue.NPCText: what's it like being ,you know, a ROUND

Responses.Text: I really don't feel comfortable with this conversation

Dialogue.NPCText: Yeah you know, you have no corners, no vertices. It's weird
